note: Data for educational attainment for the years before 2015 are estimates, while data from 2015 onwards are projections. Productivity is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices, using multiple benchmark years to adjust for differences in living costs between countries over time.
title: Productivity vs. educational attainment
subtitle: Figure illustrates educational attainment (average years of total education) versus productivity (GDP per hour worked).

display.name: Average years of education of 15-64 year old youth and adults
